heroSection.title: German UDS Innovation GmbH: Digital Innovation Ecosystem
heroSection.subtitle: Our integrated ecosystem connects academic excellence with entrepreneurial practice through strategic investments and services.
heroSection.quote: Transforming university research into marketable digital products and business models through our vertical participation structure.

investCommercial.title: Our Investment Portfolio

stakeholders.service: 100% stake in German UDS Service GmbH – responsible for the IT infrastructure for the university and external partners
stakeholders.cloudhouse: 20% stake in FB Cloudhouse GmbH – handles administrative tasks and space rental
stakeholders.university: 20% participation in German UDS gGmbH – guarantees creative involvement in the university

investCommercial.uspDescription: Our vertical structure directly involves professors and research centers in newly founded verticals. This transforms university research into marketable digital products and business models.
investCommercial.keyPeopleDescription: These professors and experts lead verticals and research initiatives at German UDS, bridging academia with digital innovation.

footer.description: Our integrated ecosystem connects academic excellence with entrepreneurial practice through strategic investments and services.
footer.stayUpdated: Stay updated with our latest investment opportunities and innovations.

business.title: Business Model
business.subtitle: Our Approach
business.description: Our core business combines strategic investments with consulting services and innovation utilization.

card1.title: 1. Investments
card1.description: Strategic development of companies in collaboration with the German University of Digital Science

card2.title: 2. Consulting and Services
card2.description: IT, Marketing, Sales, Personnel and Project Development

card3.title: 3. Innovation
card3.description: Research to market transfer, Open source

card4.title: 4. Planned Vertical Shareholding
card4.description: Professor and Research Center involvement structure

point1.title: Investment Requirements
point1.description: Initial phase: Build administrative infrastructure. Further development: Finance new investments and verticals.

point2.title: Income Sources
point2.description: Dividends from investments. Consulting fees. Government grants for innovation projects.

point3.title: Risk Management
point3.description: Diversified portfolio across technology sectors. Transparent reporting to investors.

contact.title: Interested in Investing?
contact.subtitle: Get In Touch
contact.description: Contact us to learn more about German UDS Innovation GmbH and discover how you can be part of our digital innovation ecosystem.

innovation.title: Digital Innovator
innovation.description: As a catalyst, German UDS Innovation GmbH promotes sustainable technology transfer between science and industry and achieves attractive returns on investment.

mission.title: Mission
mission.description: Promote innovation through targeted participation. Create value for investors. Connect German University of Digital Science and business through integration.

imprint.metaDescription: Legal information about German UDS Innovation GmbH, including contact details and company registration information.
imprint.title: Imprint
imprint.responsibilityText: The content of this website has been prepared with the utmost care. However, we cannot guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or timeliness of the information provided. As a service provider, we are responsible for our own content on these pages in accordance with general laws. However, we are not obligated to monitor transferred or stored third-party information or to investigate circumstances that indicate illegal activity.
imprint.disputeResolutionText: The European Commission provides a platform for online dispute resolution (OS) which is available at https://ec.europa.eu/consumers/odr/. We are not obliged and not willing to participate in a dispute settlement procedure before a consumer arbitration board.

privacy.metaDescription: Information about how German UDS Innovation GmbH collects, uses, and protects your personal data.
privacy.title: Privacy Policy

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: German UDS Innovation GmbH ('we', 'us', or 'our') is committed to protecting the privacy of our users. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website. Please read this privacy policy carefully. If you do not agree with the terms of this privacy policy, please do not access the site.

dataCollection.title: Information We Collect
dataCollection.content: We collect information that you provide directly to us as well as information that is automatically collected when you visit our website.

categories.title: We may collect the following types of information:
categories.item1: Personal data (such as name, email address, and phone number) that you voluntarily provide when contacting us
categories.item2: Log data (including your IP address, browser type, operating system, referring web page, pages visited, and date/time of visit)
categories.item3: Device information (including device type and mobile network information)
categories.item4: Location information (if you enable location services)

cookies.title: Cookies and Web Beacons
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track the activity on our Service and hold certain information. Cookies are files with a small amount of data which may include an anonymous unique identifier. You can instruct your browser to refuse all cookies or to indicate when a cookie is being sent.

dataUse.title: How We Use Your Information
dataUse.content: We may use the information we collect from you for various purposes, including to:
dataUse.item1: Provide, maintain, and improve our website and services
dataUse.item2: Respond to your inquiries, comments, or questions
dataUse.item3: Send you technical notices, updates, security alerts, and support and administrative messages

dataSharing.title: Sharing of Your Information
dataSharing.content: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personally identifiable information to outside parties except as explicitly described in this Policy. This does not include trusted third parties who assist us in operating our website, conducting our business, or servicing you, so long as those parties agree to keep this information confidential.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: If you are a resident of the European Economic Area (EEA), you have certain data protection rights. We aim to take reasonable steps to allow you to correct, amend, delete, or limit the use of your Personal Data. You have the following rights:
rights.item1: The right to access, update or delete the information we have on you
rights.item2: The right of rectification - the right to have your information corrected if it is inaccurate or incomplete
rights.item3: The right to object to our processing of your Personal Data
rights.item4: The right of restriction - the right to request that we restrict the processing of your personal information
rights.item5: The right to data portability - the right to be provided with a copy of the information we have on you in a structured, machine-readable and commonly used format

changes.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.content: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the 'Last Updated' date at the top of this Privacy Policy.
